title: We Both Got Busted And Can't Be Trusted
itunes:title: We Both Got Busted And Can't Be Trusted
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am torn to pieces over my breakup. I was dating an old friend for two years. I am 52 and he is 45. We talked about marriage and we were in the process of buying a home. We were a picture perfect couple and then things started changing. I would see him throughout the week and on weekends, but, lately he has been busy on weekends...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

I would see him throughout the week and on weekends, but, lately he has been busy on weekends...............
